text: Khalbali Records is an Indian Hindi-language musical drama television series directed by Devanshu Singh. Made by Colosceum Media, it stars Ram Kapoor, Saloni Khanna, Saloni Batra, Skand Thakur and Prabh Deep. The series is scheduled to premiere on JioCinema on 12 September, 2024. == Cast == * Ram Kapoor * Saloni Khanna * Saloni Batra * Skand Thakur * Prabh Deep == Production == The series was announced by Colosceum Media. The principal photography of the series was completed in 2022. The series teaser was released on 27 August 2024, followed by the trailer on 2 September 2024. == Music == The music for Khalbali Records is composed by Amit Trivedi and Azadi Records. == Reception == Vinamra Mathur of Firstpost awarded the series out of five stars. Shubhra Gupta of The Indian Express gave the series 3/5 stars. Troy Ribeiro of The Free Press Journal rated the series three-and-a-half out of five stars. == References == == Other websites == * * Khalbali Records on JioCinema Category:2020s drama television series Category:2020s Indian television series Category:2024 Indian television series debuts Category:Hindi-language television series
title: Khalbali Records
